definition: A leisurely pursuit or recreational activity engaged in during one's free time, often involving hobbies, sports, or other enjoyable pastimes. It is commonly used to refer to activities that individuals choose to do for relaxation or entertainment outside of their regular work or responsibilities.

examples.english: My favorite leisure activity is hiking.

examples.german: Ich treibe gerne Sport als Freizeitaktivität.
examples.english: I enjoy doing sports as a leisure activity.

examples.german: Lesen ist eine entspannende Freizeitaktivität für mich.
examples.english: Reading is a relaxing leisure activity for me.

examples.german: Meine Freizeitaktivität am Wochenende ist Gärtnern.
examples.english: My weekend leisure activity is gardening.

examples.german: Ich verbringe meine Freizeit gerne mit Malen.
examples.english: I enjoy spending my leisure time painting.
